title: Nitin Gadkari calls for GST reduction on flex fuel-based vehicles across states, issues a request to state FMs
description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari urged state finance ministers to reduce GST on flex-fuel vehicles by 12% during the IFGE India Bio-Energy & Tech Expo. He emphasized the importance of alternate fuels for families using second-hand vehicles, and highlighted major car manufacturers' commitment to introducing flex-engine cars in India.
